data.text:
Sunday,

Pop, Singer-Songwriter

James Blunt

at Rockhal Doors: 7:00 pm

ARTIST BIOGRAPHY

Prepare to be enchanted by the incomparable James Blunt as he graces the stage for an unforgettable night of music. With a voice that carries both raw emotion and exquisite melodies, James Blunt has become a global sensation, captivating audiences with his heartfelt lyrics and soul-stirring performances. James Blunt's career has been defined by chart-topping hits such as "You're Beautiful," "Goodbye My Lover," and "Stay the Night." His music has the unique ability to touch the deepest corners of the heart, leaving a lasting impact on all who listen. The new album Who We Used To Be - out October 27th on Atlantic Records.

PRACTICAL INFORMATION

Venue: Rockhal

Where: 5 avenue du Rock'n'Roll, L-4361 Esch/Alzette

Doors: 7:00 pm

Promoter: A-Promotions

Schedule: 19:00 doors // 20:00 Tors //21:00 James Blunt

Support Band: TORS

Extra Info: KULTURPASS sold-out for this show.

You may also like

Nico Santos

Rockhal
